entry.title: Julianne Moore's Game Change
entry.summary: Actress taking flak from Sarah Palin supporters for made-for-TV movie

link.Abstract: Elections are about winning and losing. Sometimes, though, playing a politician in a made-for-TV movie is a lose-lose proposition — especially when the real-life politician is as famous, divisive and high-profile as Sarah Palin.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Game Change premieres Saturday, March 10 on HBO Canada at 9 ET/8 PT.
link.title: Game Change

link.Abstract: Ed Harris famously played former U.S. Marine Corps navy pilot, astronaut, war hero, Democratic senator and one-time U.S. presidential candidate, John Glenn, in the Academy Award-nominated film, The Right Stuff. And now, Harris is about to appear as Arizona senator John McCain — a Republican — in the controversial HBO film, Game Change.
link.title: Ed Harris transformed himself for HBO movie, Game Change

entry.content: Elections are about winning and losing. Sometimes, though, playing a politician in a made-for-TV movie is a lose-lose proposition — especially when the real-life politician is as famous, divisive and high-profile as Sarah Palin.

entry.title: Harley Pasternak Wants to Start a Revolution

link.Abstract: The fitness guru, New York Times bestselling author and star of ABC's daytime talk show The Revolution is focused on promoting fitness, whether that means tackling the nation's obesity problem or spending time on the road with Kanye West and Katy Perry.

entry.title: Community Set to Return to NBC's Lineup March 15
